title: 226 - Beating Over Analysis, Leap into Full Time, Harsh Critics, Self Care and MORE
description:
It is one of our fan favorite Ask Dr. Pizza Episodes!!

In this episode my studio mate Chris Graham asks me questions you sent in to the show.

We cover a range of topics including:

  • When to Quit Your Job and Go Full Time
  • How to not fall into over analysis
  • Why your mental health might be in a fragile state
  • Dealing with harsh critique
  • Balancing Impact vs Glory

This feels like a really fresh take on this format for our show, and I have a feeling it's gonna hit you with some very TIMELY stuff!

CREDITS

Support Creative Pep Talk on Patreon: www.patreon.com/creativepeptalk

Thanks to Chris Graham from the Six Figure Home Studio Podcast for hosting!
https://itunes.apple.com/podcast/id1304699450?mt=2&ls=1

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com

SPONSORS

WIX
